documents.document: @Gary_Gillatt @GirlFromBlupo @nimbos I have thrown down my gauntlet. Let the wild rumpus start.
@LondonConcrete @ellardent The Time Tots.
@jonnymorris1973 @thejimsmith I know. :)

@sophilestweets I would like that!
@Si_Hart @ellardent I tried to get him doing TARDISes out of five, but he insisted they all got five.

"Oh help! Oh waaah!" By fluke, our back cover turns out to be topical. Illustration by @sophilestweets, typing by me with apologies to mice and gruffalos. 5/5 https://t.co/oJ1LnIgUyz
On the left, what we think might be New Information. On the right, an application form to hold opinions on #DoctorWho cc @thejimsmith 4/5 https://t.co/gv1XSsGJiE
The true story of Tegan's Auntie Vanessa. The amazing artwork by @Mogamoka2, the foolish writing by me, with apologies to @ChristelDee and @DWBBCBooks. 3/5 https://t.co/OvymMtVdqv

@Robotmeile @bigfinish Ullo. I get this sometimes if I haven't enough space on my phone, and have to delete some stuff before it will work.
